name: Shenzhen New Force Communication Technology Co., Ltd
overview: Shenzhen New Force Communication Technology Co., Ltd.(NFC) is a high-tech enterprise specializing in researching, developing, producing and selling HF(13.56Mhz), UHF(915Mhz) and 2.45Ghz of Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) Products. As a leading supplier of RFID equipments in China, NFC own core RFID technology and have many completely independent intellectual property rights of RFID Products. Our UHF RFID series products have widely and matured application in the field of intelligent vehicle management, number of terminal ports, Housing estate, Army, Petrochemical industry, Iron& steel Group, all these fields have used NFCâ€™s RFID products. Besides, our products are also widely used in time attendance , access control, tobacco logistics, warehouse management, asset management, anti-theft security products, production line automation. NFCâ€™s products have been widely sold to Middle East, Southeast Asia, North America, Europe etc.
